section.title: Viewing a Report of the Bottlenecks Trend

procedure.title: To View a Report of the Bottlenecks Trend

step.para: Expand the tree on the left side, until you can see the desired providers, clusters, or datastores.
Use the Options section to change the characteristics of the data.

listitem.para: Use Event Groups to select if you want to see bottlenecks based on capacity, utilization or both.

para.remark: What about Show Host Events?? Julie

step.para: Expand the tree on the left side, until you can see the enterprise, provider, or datastore that you want to see the trend for.
